```{r}
library("readr")
library("tibble")
library("dplyr")
library("tidyr")
library("stringr")
library("purrr")
library("magrittr")
```

Skopy is a python tool for feature extraction. Given an cell image and a label mask, 
each cell is described with many (~700) features. 

We define the image and the label directory. 
```{r}
experiment_dir <- '/Users/tbecker/Documents/2017_05_22_neutros_sp'
image_dir <- file.path(experiment_dir,'2014_07_08/images/C0') 
label_dir <- file.path(experiment_dir,'workspace/analysis/2014_07_08/label')

csv_out <- file.path(label_dir,'2014_07_08.csv')

image_names <- list.files(image_dir)
label_names <- list.files(label_dir)

file_list <- data.frame(image = image_names, label = label_names)
```

Use file.path() to create the path to images / labels and write csv file 
```{}
write_csv(file_list %>% mutate(image = file.path(image_dir,image), label = file.path(label_dir, label)), csv_out)

```
